articles.title: Helping AI agents search to get the best results out of large language models
articles.description: EnCompass executes AI agent programs by backtracking and making multiple attempts, finding the best set of outputs generated by an LLM.

articles.title: New AI model could cut the costs of developing protein drugs
articles.description: MIT researchers use large language models to optimize genetic sequences of proteins manufactured by yeast.

articles.title: AI-generated sensors open new paths for early cancer detection
articles.description: MIT and Microsoft researchers developed an AI model to design molecular sensors using nanoparticles coated with AI-generated peptides.

articles.title: When you do the math, humans still rule
articles.description: Harvard mathematician Lauren Williams leads First Proof, challenging AI to solve unpublished research-level math problems.

articles.title: New kind of AI model gives robots a visual imagination
articles.description: Kempner Institute investigator Yilun Du unveils Large Video Planner, enabling robots to envision actions before executing them.

articles.title: Boston University Ramps Up Strategy on AI
articles.description: BU launches the Artificial Intelligence Development Accelerator (AIDA) for university-wide AI adoption and collaboration.

articles.title: BU Launches Open-Source AI Infectious Diseases Monitoring Tool
articles.description: BEACON combines AI analysis with human expert verification to monitor infectious disease outbreaks globally.
